document.full_text: the starting gate of the kentucky derby is coveted real estate, considering 377 of the 35,068 thoroughbreds born in 2008 were nominated to this year's triple crown.
document.title: 35,000 to 1: for hopefuls, part of battle is just getting to the derby
lines_and_colors: the starting gate of the kentucky derby is coveted real estate, considering 377 of the 35,068 thoroughbreds born in 2008 were nominated to this year's triple crown.
